Blog Apps

These are a few of my apps that have associated blog posts and demonstrate the value of transactional data for large-scale retail organizations in cannabis.


House Brands KPIs
Evaluating the sales performance of a retailer owned house brand across various performance KPIs.
Stockout Sales Impact
Estimating the impact from supply chain interuptions on Cannabis retail sales.
Event Impact KPIs
Evaluating the impact across various business success KPIs from the adoption of Happy Cabbage.
Product Restock Model
Generate recommendations on whether products in inventory should (or not) be restocked.
Employee Sales KPIs
Evaulating retail store employees across various sales-driven performance KPIs.

R Packages

My publicly available R packages.


RestockML
R package containing app Product Restock Model
rblogapps
R package containing a collection of blog-related apps
apptemplate1
Shiny app R package template with code-coverage and app tests using shinytest2
rdstools
A minimal package containing commonly used development and logging tools
rpgconn
A minimal package containing simplified Postgres connection functionality
